channel.title: Adding pk points system
channel.description:
NOTE: I am using Deltascape based source.
I want it so when you kill someone in the wild (not at fight pits) it will award you with PK points.
When you kill someone it will award you with 2 PK points. It will also
sM("+playername+ has killed +playername+ and now has x PK points.
I tryed coding this myself but i kept coming up with errors. Please help.

item.title: Adding pk points system
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
